sources.title: Zombie Nation(2004)
sources.description: DVD RIP DISCLAIMER: THIS FILM IS SO AWFUL! WATCH AT YOUR OWN RISK!  Plot:  A psychotic police officer who murders his female arrestees gets what's coming to him when a horde of zombified women rise from their graves to seek revenge.

metadata.Plot: A psychotic police officer who murders his female arrestees gets what's coming to him when a horde of zombified women rise from their graves to seek revenge.
metadata.Actors: Gunter Ziegler, Brandon Dean, Axel Montgomery
